dcterms:creator: Michael Gasik
dcterms:description: This dataset contains historical data on ferroalloys consumption in Basic Oxygen Furnace steelmaking, which is used for modeling and optimization of the steel production process.
dcterms:title: Ferroalloys consumption in Basic Oxygen Furnace steelmaking

dcterms:creator: A. Carrillo
Shi Jin
Lei Li
Yuhua Zhu
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into optimization methods specifically designed for gradient descent machine learning models, which can be applied to various optimization tasks in steelmaking.
dcterms:title: Optimization methods for gradient descent machine learning models

dcterms:creator: Shiliang Sun
Zehui Cao
Han Zhu
Jing Zhao
dcterms:description: This dataset surveys various optimization methods from a machine learning perspective, providing a comprehensive overview that can be useful for optimizing processes in steelmaking.
dcterms:title: Survey of Optimization Methods from a Machine Learning Perspective

dcterms:creator: T. A. Zheldak
V. V. Slesarev
D. O. Volovenko
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on a knowledge-based decision support system for steel deoxidation in the Basic Oxygen Furnace production process, which can enhance the optimization of ferroalloys consumption.
dcterms:title: Knowledge-Based Intellectual DSS of Steel Deoxidation in BOF Production Process

dcterms:creator: M. Han
C. Liu
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an endpoint prediction model for basic oxygen furnace steel-making, utilizing advanced algorithms to enhance the prediction accuracy of steel production processes.
dcterms:title: Endpoint prediction model for basic oxygen furnace steel-making

dcterms:creator: D. Laha
Y. Ren
P. N. Suganthan
dcterms:description: This dataset models the steelmaking process using effective machine learning techniques, providing insights into the optimization of steel production.
dcterms:title: Modeling of steelmaking process with effective machine learning techniques

dcterms:creator: Robert Kłopotek
Mieczysław Kłopotek
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the probabilistic k-richness of k-means algorithms, which can be relevant for clustering tasks in steelmaking optimization.
dcterms:title: Probabilistic k-Richness of the k-Means Algorithms
